com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.state.scene
Class BattleState

java.lang.Object
  com.jmex.game.state.GameState
      com.jmex.game.state.BasicGameState
          com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.state.GameState
              com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.state.scene.BattleState
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameState
public class BattleState
extends GameState

BattleState extends GameState to define the world game state where the player interacts with other players in a snow ball fight.

BattleState initializes by first loading the battle scene graph then construct all the IController that is responsible for handling user input events. It is also responsible for propagating the game update invocation down to the IController and IEntity it manages.

Version:
Creation date: 07-11-2008 12:25 EST, Modified date: 08-11-2008 16:54 EST
Author:
Yi Wang (Neakor)
